availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elias G Ford (Hart County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier in 33rd and 26th KY)

body.p: Hart County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. North Carolina native. Married to Mary Ford. Farmer in Kentucky in 1862. Served in Company D 33rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a Private from September 13, 1862, to April 1, 1864. Captured and paroled at the Battle of Munfordville, Kentucky, on September 17, 1862. Served in Company K 26th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a Private from April 1, 1864, to June 30, 1865.
